body: You have made something not forgavible  I would personally want to disembowel you. And to those how may ridicule me this is my free speech call me what you like, even threaten but let me tell you never get in between a otaku and his wafiu!!!
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me

Absolute garbage, a shit story with a poor art . It’s exactly what you can expect from an author and fans who want to avoid reality where their lovers is in their bed with random guys while these guys come here to watch these kind of shit .
